remarks: Value of the structure replacement function at a replaced index. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
setsid.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
setsid $p |- ( ( W e. A /\ C e. V ) -> C = ( E ` ( W sSet <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. ) ) ) $.
